Reviews.Content: stayed 4days total wonderful hotel partner dan thoroughly enjoyed stay birthday effort fantastic day stay excellent value money definitely recommend looking nice warm atmosphere

Reviews.Title: “The most unfriendly, lazy and a "don't care" attitude staff that we encountered in France was at the Du Theatre Hotel.”
